mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ename, status, etc, address, detailaddress, eday, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(enotion, 4000, 1) AS enotion, eimage, homepage, price FROM event_info
SELECT DISTINCT ename, status, etc, address, detailaddress, eday, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(enotion, 4000, 1) AS enotion, eimage, homepage, price FROM event_info where ename = #{ename}
